data.text: @publichealthni Shameful advert following the Pfizer report. You should be disbanded!

@publichealthni February 11, 2022, Pfizer withdrew its U.S. Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) application for children According to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and Pfizer, they want to collect more data on a third dose, as two doses did not produce immunity in 2- to 5-year-olds

@publichealthni Be careful with kids “First in vitro study on the effect of COVID-19 mRNA vaccine BNT162b2 on human liver cell line. We present evidence on fast entry of BNT162b2 into the cells and subsequent intracellular reverse transcription of BNT162b2 mRNA into DNA”

https://t.co/DZBs9ufDLK
@publichealthni @hicksyalex Omg after they released off the adverse effects you are actually promoting this
@publichealthni Petition: Don't offer covid-19 vaccine to 5-11 year olds until phase 3 trials complete https://t.co/aeZTObOdaK
@publichealthni Wish I never took it let alone kids
@publichealthni Child abuse hang your heads in shame

@publichealthni How much protection do they get?
How long does it last?
Are there any risks?

Informed consent is so pre 2020 🤦‍♂️
